_sText:
Village Escape has reached a stadium that i consider to be close to final.

The map offers a fun and quick zombieescape gameplay

1. Escape the Village using
- one of the two busses
- the Undergound
- or go by foot

2. Reach the Factory and defend it from the Zombies!
3. Hop on one of the Trains that pass by endlessly and 
4. Get to the secret barn and defend it from the Zombies until the toxic Gas gets released

TWO AFK TELEPORTER SO THE GAME NEVER GETS BORING EVEN IF UR A NOOB ^^

Many improvements in this version:

- new Skybox and better lighting
- improved FPS (although the map worked just fine before)
- around 60-300 FPS on 9600GT
- Many Gameplay fixes eg. in Factory and Barn
- Balance drastically improved!
- Added exploding Generator 
- Added Weapons in the barn
- Visual Tweaks/Improvements
- Improved Visleafs
- fixed multiple trigger outputs
- all models disappear when u reach a certain distance 
-> performance boost
